title: Waterloo bridge
creator_credit: Mervyn LeRoy, Sidney A. Franklin and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Starring Vivian Leigh and Robert Taylor, this is a tragic tale. An army officer marries a ballerina. When he is reported missing his family ignores her and she sinks into prostitution. A ‘weepie’ which has had mixed reviews over time, but still remains very popular.
creator_credit_for_label: Mervyn LeRoy, Sidney A. Franklin and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
